name: elemental (itch) (Retro Cloud Studios)
description:
"elemental" is a survival horror game that takes the point-and-click mechanics of Five Nights at Freddy's and combines them with puzzles and minigames. Every night is different. Every night you have a different objective, with different puzzles. The one thing that stays the same is that you still have the keep 'them' away. At all costs. The question is, do you have what it takes?

CONTROLS

Left Click 

- Interact

- Go forward/back when you face the generator

- Go forward/back when you face the doors

Right Click 

- Hold doors shut when you peek through them

- Peek through the ceiling when you face the generator (Don't worry about this one in the demo)

F - Flashlight

GAMEPLAY

You need to start up the generator, but look out for the creature. You need to frequently check both doors for it. If you see it, hold the door shut for about 3 seconds, then you can continue starting the generator.

DISCORD
